_source.text: 2004 -- Medical redshirt while recovering from Tommy John surgery following undefeated freshman season ... Named to 2004 SEC Spring Academic Honor Roll ... Better than 3.0 GPA both semesters 2003-04 ... Named to Dean's List in spring of 2004.
